info.name: Succubus
info.description: The Forgottens Race from the Aurora_flex, created by user "Knightoffline", with major contributions from user "Nion", and minor contributions from others users.
info.author: Forgottens varliği unutulmus bir irktir kendileri kanlari ölümsüzlüğün sirrini içerdiği gerekçesiyle yok edilmiştir. Kalan 3-5 kişinin soyu ise o kadar zamandir dünyadan uzaklar ki kimse onlari hatirlamiyor.

description.p: Forgottens varliği unutulmus bir irktir kendileri kanlari ölümsüzlüğün sirrini içerdiği gerekçesiyle yok edilmiştir. Kalan 3-5 kişinin soyu ise o kadar zamandir dünyadan uzaklar ki kimse onlari hatirlamiyor.
Forgottens tamamen izole yaşarlar, ölen üyelerini anmak için dünyanin çeşitli yerlerine lahitler insa ederler, yaşamlarindaki halini temsilen bir santanc tasi olarak sembolize ederler.
Forgottens kalplerinin derinlerinde derin bir intikam arzusu yatar ve bu duygu uyandiğinda onu durdurmak nerdeyse imkansizdir..
Unutulmuşlar gerçek halleriyle insanlara benzer bir görünüme sahiptirler, ancak kirmizi veya beyaz gözlüdürler. Genellikle ince, beyaz tonlu ve çok nadiren aşiri kaslidirlar.
Forgottens tend to have names in the Celestial or strx language.
Beautiful fiends who thrive on the corruption of immortal souls.

Ability Score Increase.Your Charisma scores increase by 2 and intelligence increase by 1.
Age. Forgottens are similar to humans, typically reaching adulthood between the ages of 16 and 19 and can live 300 years.
Alignment.Due to their revenge, succubi often tend toward evil alignments. Neutral or good Fotgottens are extremely rare, but not unheard of. They have no particular tendency toward or against lawful or chaotic alignments.
Size.They are similar in size to most other humanoid races. Your size is Medium.
Speed.Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Darkvision.Because you are a godblooded you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.
Fiendish Nature.Your creature type is considered to be both Celestial and Humanoid.
Cursed Blood.As an bonus action, you can use hex without using any compenent or spell slot.
Silver Tongue.You have proficiency with the Persuasion skill. If you spend 1 minute talking to someone who can understand what you say, you can make a Charisma (Persuasion) check contested by the creature's Wisdom (Insight) check. If you or your companions are fighting the creature, your check automatically fails. If your check succeeds, the target is magically charmed by you as long as it remains within 60 feet of you and for 1 minute thereafter.
Languages.You can speak, read, and write Common and your choice of Celestial or Infernal.
Your creature type is considered to be both Celestial and Humanoid.
